column4: hi, my netbook that i'm runnign netbook remix on won't go to sleep when left idle. If i shut the cover it will, but not if i just walk away
any ideas?
change your power settings
any idea?
you need to change the power management settings
does it go to sleep after 5 mins when you are on battery not AC power ?
it DOESN'T go to sleep.... which is the problem
sorry, never used netbook remix, did you google ?
yeah.. i doubt netbook remix is much different than regular
do you have any apps running at the moment ?
yeah a few
can you try once after closing all of them
that means i'll have to close irc :-P i'll try that in a few minutes though
other than irc
as far as I know, irc does not block
i have irc/firefox/pidgin/terminal open
ahh, yeah don't ahve that open
what netbook is yours ?
Toshiba NB205
cant find anything like that, why dont you file a bug report
i think i will
